title: Congratulating Aviva Franz upon the occasion of her designation as recipient of the Patriot's Pen Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating Aviva Franz upon the occasion of
her designation as recipient of the Patriot's Pen Award by the  Veterans
of Foreign Wars of the United States William M. Gouse Jr. Post 3211

WHEREAS,  It is the custom of this Legislative Body to recognize and pay
tribute to those exemplary students who  have  distinguished  themselves
through  their  outstanding  commitment,  and  who have received notable
recognition within their academic community; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to congratu-
late Aviva Franz upon the occasion of her designation  as  recipient  of
the  Patriot's  Pen  Award  by the Veterans of Foreign Wars (VFW) of the
United States William M. Gouse Jr. Post 3211, to be  celebrated  at  its
Annual  Voice  of  Democracy and Patriot's Pen Awards in Hicksville, New
York, on Monday, February 28, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, Patriot's Pen gives sixth, seventh and eighth grade  students
the  opportunity  to  express  their  opinion  on  a patriotic theme and
improve upon their writing skills; and
  WHEREAS, Contestant, Aviva Franz, submitted  an  outstanding  original
essay  on this year's theme, "Does Patriotism Still Matter," and proudly
claimed first place for Hicksville Middle School's Patriot's  Pen  Award
Contest; and
  WHEREAS,  Educational  competitions  which serve to better prepare our
students for  their  future  participation  in  patriotic  and  academic
endeavors, are worthy of praise and support; and
  WHEREAS,  Poised eagerly with enthusiasm and determined purpose, Aviva
Franz now stands honorably, with just pride in her  accomplishments  and
in eager anticipation of future challenges, understanding and appreciat-
ing the caring counsel and support provided by her teachers, coaches and
parents; and
  WHEREAS,  It is the intent of this Legislative Body to commend and pay
tribute to those young people who, by achieving outstanding  success  in
educational competition, have inspired and brought pride to our majestic
Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate Aviva Franz upon the occasion of her designation as recipi-
ent of the Patriot's Pen Award by the Veterans of Foreign  Wars  of  the
United States William M. Gouse Jr. Post 3211; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Hicksville Middle School and Aviva Franz.
